Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class CreateNewGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.CreateNewGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewController
public class CreateNewGameController extends Object implements ViewController
This class represents the controller for creating a new game. It handles the user interface interactions and game creation logic.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the buttons for choosing the number of players.

    • onClick

      public void onClick(String text)
      Handles the click event when a number of players button is clicked. It creates a new game and adds the selected number of players.
      Parameters:
      text - the text of the button clicked
